titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NUMBER OF FETUSES (NOTED DURING PREGNANCY EPISODE) - Description

div.p: NUMBER OF FETUSES (NOTED DURING PREGNANCY EPISODE) Â is the same as attribute NUMBER OF FETUSES, noted at any time during a Maternity Episode, which resulted in Delivery of a live or still born baby.
For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, NUMBER OF FETUSES (NOTED DURING PREGNANCY EPISODE) excludes fetus papyraceous and fetuses reabsorbed in utero and not delivered.
